document.full_text: law enforcement fatalities for 2011 are on track to be one of the highest in recent years, with the count hitting 71 this week as survivors and friends of the fallen prepared for an annual candlelight vigil.
document.title: thousands expected to honor fallen police as death rate climbs
lines_and_colors: law enforcement fatalities for 2011 are on track to be one of the highest in recent years, with the count hitting 71 this week as survivors and friends of the fallen prepared for an annual candlelight vigil.
